features: 【3-In-1 Selfie Stick and Tripod Stand】Selfie stick tripod can be extended between 8.07 to 46 inches, which makes it very suitable for Photograph, Face time, Business, living broadcasting more. It features a fully expandable handheld selfie stick handle with built-in collapsible legs that allow it to double as a stand-alone tripod when opened. You can easily switch between Selfie Stick Mode & Phone Tripod Mode for your preferred use.

【with Remote Shutter】: The range of the wireless connection can be up to 10 meters. Remote control can take up to 1,000+ photos. It can be perfectly Compatible with most smart phone in market, iOS/Android Compatible. If you have an Android phone, when your phone finishes pairing with the remote, a button press that only increases the media volume, not the shutter, please set it up as follows.You need to make cellphone settings, in Settings - Application Settings - System Application Settings - Camera Settings - Volume Key Function - Select Shooting Shutter.

【Lightweight and Portable】:The professional & lightweight selfie stick tripod with remote is made of high-quality aluminum alloy and ABS materials, Only 7oz weight. It is compact and lightweight enough to store and take anywhere you go. Pack it in your purse, backpack, or suitcase without making a dent.
【Adjustable Angle and Rotatable Phone Holder】: 360°Rotatable Phone Holder and 180° Rotation Head allow you could take photos, video call or live broadcasting.

【Widely CompatibleUniversal 】: Notice :Phone or Camera Weight Limit 300 Grams.phone Holder fits most smartphones, compatible with All iPhone/Android Smart phones. With universal 1/4 inch screw, it fits for digital camera, DSLR, SLR, action camera , webcam, camcorder.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About BZE BZE focus on tripod selfie stick field for many years. We provide good idea and product for you. Our core company beliefs: Quality, Value and Service.

Why Need a Selfie Stick Wanna Record your memories of life? Wanna stay every wonderful monment forever? Why Need a Wireless selfie stick tripod Gone are the days of having to ask a stranger to take photos for you. With it, you can take photos with family and friends at any time. Wireless Remote Control Wireless connection range: 33ft, Chargingtime: 45~60 min, Shooting photos: about 3000 photos, Compatible with smartphone Adjustable Phone Holder With 360°rotation, simply twist the cradle head or phone holder to takephotos, video call or live broadcasting, to meet your different needs, orsituation. Specification Material:Aluminum Alloy + Rubber . Max Extened Length (mm): 46inch . Cellphone holder，Suitable for width between 2.05in-4.13in cellphone. Folded Length (mm) :8 inch . Weight: 235g/8.28oz (include Phone Holder) . Sections: 7 . Package list 1 x Selfie stick 1 x Phone Tripod Mount Holder 1 x Remote Controller 1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great in every way!
reviews.reviewText: Love this one. It all collapses on itself for compact storage yet is easy to expand. The tripod works great, yet stays shut for a handle very well. The telescoping mechanism is firm and strong and won’t collapse. The bluetooth button is easy to manage and stays in place with a magnet. It seems a bit weak though, so I fear it might slip out if something bumps it.Best of all is the customer service (through Amazon.) my bluetooth button stopped working so I submitted a replacement and they sent one right out, and trusted me to return the old one (which I did, of course) with their pre-paid shipping label.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Far superior than the Walmart selfie sticks
reviews.reviewText: I really like that it's both a selfie stick and a stand. It seems a little wobbly but doesn't fall over. Gets the job done. Pulls out smooth. You don't have to twist to tighten or loosen which is nice. It was cheaper than the one I got at Walmart and the quality was better! Worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and stable, great tripod for a great value
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this 40-inch Extendable Selfie Stick Tripod to use with my iPhone and I am extremely impressed with its functionality and versatility. I was tired of having to ask strangers to take pictures for me and my wife, and this selfie stick tripod has been quite a rescue. The extendable pole allows for a wide range of shooting angles, making it perfect for capturing group shots, couple photos, panoramic views, and even action shots.The tripod is also very stable, ensuring that my shots come out clear and shake-free. I have used it on a number of different kinds of surface including grass, sand and carpet. It does stay stable. Recently, I was on a beach in Florida with my wife, and this tripod came in really handy for taking our pictures without having to ask the strangers all the time. It was also very useful to take time lapse video of the beautiful sunset. If you do not extend it all the way, the tripod can stay highly stable even if the surface is a little uneven. The wireless remote shutter is really helpful, making it easy to take photos without having to fumble with my phone's camera controls. The battery on the remote lasts for a long time. I have only charged it once so far for my 3 trips to Florida.I noticed two main issues with this tripod though. The first issue is that the phone holder is not retractable, which makes it really inconvenient to always rotate the knob for attaching the camera. Having said that, I think having to rotate the knob to hold the phone makes the phone more secure in the tripod than if it were retractable. Another issue is, like others have suggested, that you cannot really switch between the front and back cameras with the remote. It would have been really great if that functionality was available.Overall, I highly recommend this Selfie Stick Tripod to anyone looking for a versatile and high-quality tripod that's compatible with iPhone.

reviews.reviewerName: Allen C Morse IIIAllen C Morse III
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicest selfie stick I've ever had! It's a tripod too!
reviews.reviewText: WOW! What an accessory for your phone this is! It's remarkable how good photographs and video are when you put your phone on a selfie stick but wow this stick goes above and beyond! Push in at the bottom and legs flip out and it's a stable tripod that you can even adjust to eye level! I have noticed it's a bit of a quandry to deploy these legs, it's not easy to deploy them, in fact rather difficult, but once you do, it's awesome! Instead of the thin flexible portable radio antenna like sections, this has nice thick and stout pipes that extend out to the length you desire. The REALLY NICE things about this stick are: It has a BLIETOOTH REMOTE shutter release that is attached magnetically and comes off so you can stand at a distance and completely control the camera, including start/stop doing video! THIS IS WAY COOL! It doesn't have a spring clamp on the camera holder but you can screw it down tight and it's not popping out ever. It handles up to a 7" tablet, so a big screened phone in a thick protective case fits right in! If you're a photographer like me and find your phone does some things your DSLR doesn't or does poorly, YOU GOTTA HAVE THIS!!! Oh and the phone mount assembly can come off and be screwed into a standard photograpic tripod as well...how cool is that? A must have guys & gals!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For the price its pretty good
reviews.reviewText: I use this for my TikTok channel where I make custom rugs. It is pretty flimsy and tips over very easy. Cant hold the weight of a phone very well as it tips down a ton. The remote control is pretty nice and has a smart design. It just inputs the volume up on your phone through Bluetooth which takes a picture/video on apple. Overall for the price it's pretty good but not the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile, comes with all mounting options
reviews.reviewText: Nice selfie stick that comes with multiple mounting options, 1/4 inch camera mount, action camera mount and adjustable phone mount that fits big phones. I chose this stick because of the tripod option built into the bottom of the selfie stick that works well and was stable while using. Remote was easy to pair to my iPhone and worked well. Thin aluminum stick but it is painted black and looks good. Overall great value and I am happy with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: I got the exact product that i was looking for..
reviews.reviewText: Thank you for this product I really like it.

En general me encantó el producto, es muy resistente. aunque no es tan pequeño como lo esperaba al guardar, la realidad es que es tan bueno, que no importa que no se haga más chiquito para transportarlo,sería bueno le adaptaran un algo para colgar fácilmente de la muñeca o un ganchito para su fácil transportación. También lo detecto un poco inestale. Pero la realidad es que sí vale mucho la pena. Lo adoré

reviews.reviewTitle: This is like OEM product, just taking photo function
reviews.reviewText: A little bit dispointed cause I had bought a Chinese product, yunteng, it work on Samsung note phone, just one simple function, taking photo, that is all. So I search lot, read reviews, make sure the newer one can work with Samsung, ya, it work, but still simple one function and it use chinese yunteng controller, nothing change, almost double price. The difference are tripod, quality much better than Chinese one. That is all
Didnt like that you cant turn the phone.I gave it to a friend.He liked it
Súper práctico al ser recargable. Muy fácil de usar y muy útil
